title: Dauphiné ‘Crucial’ for Van der Poel, Picnic-PostNL Loses Degenkolb, Jakobsen as WorldTour Salvation Hangs in Balance
content:
Van der Poel cleared to race Dauphiné despite wrist injury from MTB crash, Picnic-PostNL loses two key riders for Tour de France as relegation battle heats up.

Read the full article at Dauphiné ‘Crucial’ for Van der Poel, Picnic-PostNL Loses Degenkolb, Jakobsen as WorldTour Salvation Hangs in Balance on Velo.
author: ahood
